about.label: About
about.headline: About Date My Dish
about.subline: This blog is your go-to guide for cooking delicious meals that help you create lasting impressions and unforgettable moments, whether you're cooking for a date night or a special occasion.

recipes.label: Recipes
recipes.title: Date Night Recipes
recipes.description: Spice up your evening with irresistible date night recipes designed to impress and ignite passion. Discover dishes that create the perfect romantic atmosphere and bring you closer together.
recipes.headline: Romantic Meal Ideas
recipes.subline: Dishes to set the mood for any special occasion

tips.label: Cooking Tips
tips.title: Essential Cooking Tips: Master the Art of Delicious Meals
tips.description: Transform your kitchen skills with expert cooking tips. Learn how to enhance flavors, save time, and create restaurant-quality dishes from the comfort of your home.
tips.headline: Elevate Your Cooking Skills
tips.subline: Easy tips to help you cook with confidence and flavor

reviews.label: Restaurant reviews
reviews.title: Restaurant Reviews: Honest Insights for Food Lovers
reviews.description: Explore top restaurant reviews with genuine insights on food, ambiance, and service. Discover hidden gems and must-visit dining spots near you or around the world.
reviews.headline: Dine-In Reviews
reviews.subline: Find your next favorite spot with honest recommendations
